page.title: 13LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: People in{Great Oakley}leave the village to go to the new{Dovercourt {Swimming Pool.}They also play {badminton, tennis}and go{roller {skating}at Dovercourt. Boys belong to} Thorpe,Weeley and Dovercourt Scouts. There is a{Brownie pack}in Great Oakley.Some children like going to the {Music school}at Thorpe.Judo is very popular,many children and their parents belong to Harwich Judo Club.Some people go to the only pub in the village,'The Maybush',it has a {Cricket team.}There is a branch of the Workers Educational Association,which holds lectures in the Village Hall.At the moment there is a{clay pigeon {shooting}club in the village but it does not have planning permission and there is a great argument about whether or not it should continue.
